snippet: Three blasts in central Nairobi killed at least six people and wounded 25 on Monday in a coordinated terrorist strike, officials said.
abstract: Three blasts in central Nairobi, Kenya, kill at least six people and wound 25 in a coordinated terrorist strike.
lead_paragraph: Three blasts in central Nairobi killed at least six people and wounded 25 on Monday in a coordinated terrorist strike, officials said.
